title: French glassware maker Verallia begins IPO process - Nasdaq.com
text: PARIS, Sept 5 (Reuters) - French glass bottle maker Verallia said on Thursday it had begun the process for an initial public offering in Paris, setting the stage for the largest new listing in the country this year.
Verallia, controlled since 2015 by U.S. investment company Apollo, said on Wednesday the French stock market regulator had approved its IPO registration document.
The plans for a listing remain dependent on favourable market conditions, the company has said.
